title: Dog walker knocks a woman, 68, out cold with a punch to the face and spits on her after she
text:
An elderly woman was punched in the face and spat on by a dog walker after she asked him to pick up his dog's poo.

Police claim the man punched the 68-year-old so hard that she lost consciousness while walking on the Sandgate foreshore in Queensland at around 7pm on Tuesday.

The incident is believed to have started when the woman asked the man to pick up after his American Staffy.

Police claim the man punched the 68-year-old so hard that she lost consciousness while walking on the Sandgate foreshore in Queensland at around 7pm on Tuesday (stock)

After being punched and spat on, the woman was taken to hospital.

Police are yet to formally interview her.

The man is described as aged in his 30s, white with an olive complexion and about 180cm tall.

He was wearing a yellow top, dark pants and no shoes, and was last seen walking toward Second Avenue, according to Queensland Police.

Police are appealing for anyone that witnessed the incident or may have CCTV or dashcam footage of that area to contact police.
description: Police claim the man punched the 68-year-old so hard that she lost consciousness while walking on the Sandgate foreshore in Queensland at around 7pm on Tuesday.
authors: Alana Mazzoni For Daily Mail Australia
